Reviews.Title: “Great Value: Affordable - Clean Rooms”
Reviews.Author: Oscar1947
Reviews.Content: wife kids stayed branson week prince charles inn found value simple hotel cheap price booked online third night free clean wife looked beds breakfast typical cereal fruit juice toast location wife daughter spent time hill tanger mall boys rode carts people hotel talkative friendly

Reviews.Title: “Awful! Embarrasing to have picked it for our group.”
Reviews.Author: brendamerz
Reviews.Content: except location booked 20 complaints dirty mold bathrooms toilet didnt flush properly sink leaked breakfast meager manager meet welcome stay recommend
